hi again,

i resolve this problem. is Font on C: windows / font with 1.03c is broken. i installing 1.02, copy 4 aerosoft in font. reboot. installing 1.03c and after proccessing, copy foot of 1.02 in C:windows/fonts. 

Is clear thx !!

Aymeric
